text: @SecPompeo Wuhan lockdown on Jan23rd，US ban airline from China on Feb 2nd, now is Mar 16th, what did all of you guys do during this 53days?! Any preparation?other than mocking the Chinese &accuse them for being totalitarian? Now every country need lockdown want talk about human rights?!
